article:
'Commercial waste' consists of waste from premises used wholly or mainly for the
purposes of a trade or business or for the purpose of sport, recreation,
education or entertainment but not including household; agricultural or
industrial waste. [http://www.wastenot.ie/pport/web/Classification/2/5.13.1-
?did=597726202&pageUrl=/Classification/2/5.7 Commercial Waste Definition] Waste
Not - Waste Management Awareness for the South East of Ireland
